Gameplay instructions

Use WASD keys to move;
Use Q to access the game menu;
Use the E key to interact with the door and other items;
Use the F key to pick up the weapon;
Use the 1 key to draw/sheathe weapon;
Use SPACE to jump;
Use the mouse left button for attack.

Engine
Unreal 5.03
